tool_description: The simplest web scraping API on the web. We handle Proxies, Javascript rendering and Captchas for you!
name: ScrapingBee
title: ScrapingBee

api_list.name: HTML scraping
api_list.description: Fetch raw HTML from any website

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The encoded URL you want to fetch

optional_parameters.name: cookies
optional_parameters.description: Send custom cookies to the page you want to scrape. We currently only handle name and value of custom cookies. If you want to set multiple cookies just separate cookies with ';'. Example: 'cookie_name_1=cookie_value1;cookie_name_2=cookie_value_2'

optional_parameters.name: js_snippet
optional_parameters.description: A base 64 encoded JavaScript snippet that is run once the page is fetched.

optional_parameters.name: render_js
optional_parameters.description: Fetch this page and render JavaScript or not
